projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience with Django and Django REST Framework (DRF). Can you provide a specific example of a challenging API you developed and the technologies you used?
How have you optimized database queries and application performance in your previous roles? Describe a situation where you significantly improved performance.
Explain your approach to implementing authentication and authorization in a RESTful API. What security best practices do you follow?
Describe your experience with writing unit and integration tests for backend applications. What tools and frameworks have you used?
Given a list of integers, write a function to find the second largest number.
Explain your experience with Celery and message queues. How have you used them to solve specific problems?
Describe your experience with PostgreSQL and Redis. What are the key differences and use cases for each?
Have you used any AWS services like S3 or Lambda? If so, describe your experience.
